q_en: What are the orders for PolyU?

steps.sql: SELECT o.id, o.order_name, o.created_at FROM orders o JOIN customers c ON o.user_id = c.id WHERE c.customer_name = 'PolyU';
steps.description: Retrieve the orders for the customer named 'PolyU' by joining the customers and orders tables.

response:
Sure thing! Here are the orders for the customer named "PolyU":

| Order ID | Order Name   | Created At   |
|----------|--------------|--------------|
| 1        | PolyU_Tshirt | 2024-01-10   |
| 9        | PolyU_Skirt  | 2024-05-10   |
